title: Nursing Practical Skills Enhancement: Legislative and Health Policy Advocacy for Dental Hygienist Leadership Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can analyze legislative processes related to dental hygiene and develop concrete action plans for policy changes.
Students can identify regional/national public health policy issues and develop/present advocacy strategies.
Through project-based learning activities, students can collaborate effectively with team members and acquire communication skills to persuade stakeholders.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
